word: This incident is full of instruction. Jesus, the world\92s Redeemer, is drawing close to the time when He will give His life for a sinful world. Yet how little did even His disciples realize what they were about to lose. Mary could not reason upon this subject. Her heart was filled with pure, holy love. The sentiment of her heart was \93What shall I render unto the Lord for all His benefits toward me?\94 This ointment, costly as it was estimated by the disciples, was but a poor expression of her love for her Master. But Christ could appreciate the gift as an expression of her love, and Mary\92s heart was filled with perfect peace and happiness.
